short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show <h> tag and meta info on page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays all H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6 tags on the page and key meta information. It's a simple yet useful tool for SEO specialists and web content creators.

To view the tags, click the "Show/Hide Tags" button.
To view the Meta page information, click the "Show/Hide Meta" button.
To view the page in its original state, click the "Reset Page" button.

With this extension, you can easily check the structure of the <H> tags on your page and view key meta information, such as the page Title, Description, Robots, Canonical, and Viewport.
